K10D0204_H0205:140b-10: bde gshegs mchod rten mar me phul byas pas //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-11: de yis las byas pa ni de nyid kyis //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-12: 'khor los bsgyur ba mi bdag stobs chen ldan //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-13: yid 'ong gzugs bzang lta na dga' bar 'gyur //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-14: de yis las byas pa des tshe ring 'gyur //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-15: gcig tu dag pa nyid kyi bde dang ldan //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-16: de yis lus ni nad kyis nyon mi mongs //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-17: mar me phul ba'i rnam smin de yin no //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-18: bde bar gshegs la mar mes mchod byas pas //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-19: rkun po'i gnod med rgyal po'i chad pa med //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-20: gshed ma med cing chung ma byi bo med //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-21: de ni las kyis nam yang gtse mi 'gyur //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-22: bde zhing lo legs gang du'ang 'jigs pa med //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-23: rtag tu 'byor cing legs 'byor nor 'bru ldan //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-24: de yi skyed mos tshal mchog phreng ba dang //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-25: tshal dang shing phran lo ma sna tshogs brgyan //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-26: de yis 'jig rten gtso bo sangs rgyas mthong //
K10D0204_H0205:140b-27: mthong nas kyang ni mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-0: @141a *// de dag rnams la gus par de mchod byed //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-1: rgyal srid spangs nas dge slong nyid la sten //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-2: bsngags pa mtha' yas gzigs pa mtha' yas shing //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-3: mtha' yas blo ldan bde gshegs mchod rten la //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-4: mar me phul bas mtha' yas blo ldan 'gyur //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-5: mar me bzhin du phyogs rnams kun tu gsal //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-6: mar me chen pos skyes mchog thub pa yi; ;mchod rten gsal byas rnam dag mig gis ni //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-7: byang chub rdul bral zag pa med thob nas //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-8: de phyogs kun tu mar me bzhin du gsal //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-9: bde gshegs mchod rten mar me phul bas na //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-10: rnam grol blo mnga' stobs bcu rnams ldan zhing //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-11: de bzhin ma 'dres chos kyi pha rol byon //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-12: kun nas spyan ldan bde bar gshegs par 'gyur //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-13: phyogs rnams dag na bgrang byas 'jig rten khams //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-14: gang dag ci snyed yod pa ma lus pa //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-15: mar me lta bur me yi rgyu yi ni //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-16: ma lus pa dag rtag tu snang byas 'gyur //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-17: bdag nyid che la ma ra me phul ba las //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-18: mthu 'byung gang yin de ni de yin no //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-19: mar me 'dra ba dag la sems can kun //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-20: lhag byas gal te mthu chen don dam mthong //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-21: rang rgyal rnams su gyur la de mchod phyir; ;gcig 'gas mar me 'bar bar byas gyur la //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-22: mar me snying po ri rab tsam byas shing //
K10D0204_H0205:141a-23: de yis 'jig rten ma lus snang byas la //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-0: rnam pa de 'dras mtha' @141b yas phyogs kun tu //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-1: gal te mar me 'bul bar byed gyur la //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-2: rang rgyal byang chub tu ni smon sems kyis //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-3: bskal pa brgya phrag mtha' yas 'bar byed las //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-4: gang zhig byang chub phyir ni smon sems kyis //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-5: mchod rten mchog la rtsva mes gsal byed na //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-6: de bas de mchog 'bras bu ches che zhes //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-7: don dam gzigs pa sangs rgyas rnams gsung ngo; ;phyogs bcu'i skye bo gang dag dpag med pa //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-8: rang sangs rgyas nyid mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-9: re res de bzhin mar me rnams phul zhing //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-10: bskal pa grangs med de dga' bar byed la //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-11: 'jig rten ched du bde gshegs nyid 'dod cing //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-12: gang zhig 'jig rten dam pa'i mchod rten la //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-13: mar me 'bul lam lan gcig phyag btsal na //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-14: de bas 'di bsod 'bras bu khyad par 'phags //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-15: sangs rgyas spyod yul mthong dka' bas ma mi khyab //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-16: thos nas dad dang dga' ba skyed par byed //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-17: dad med chos mchog mthob byis pa rnams //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-18: zhum zhum por ni shin tu byed par 'gyur //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-19: de phyir 'jig rten kun mgon gang yin pa //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-20: dag chos spyod yul can rnams rnyed dka' bas //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-21: thub rnams spyan sngar shin tu dad sems kyis //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-22: sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du smon lam thob //
K10D0204_H0205:141b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10D0204_H0205:142a-0: @142a *// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K10D0204_H0205:142a-4: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10D0204_H0205:142a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do /
K10D0204_H0205:142a-6: 'phags pa mar me dbul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0204_H0205:142a-7: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradzny'a warma dang; zhus chen
K10D0204_H0205:142a-8: gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sde la sogs
